description: Acquisition of music instruments including delivery in Shawinigan, Quebec
full_summary:
**Tender Notice**
=====================================

* **Tender Title (English) / Titre de l'appel d'offres (french)**: Acquisition of Music Instruments
* **Reference Number (English) / Numéro de référence (French)**: WS3657198899-Doc3657233377

**Solicitation Details**
------------------------

* **Publication Date (English) / Date de publication (French)**: October 17, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date (English) / Date de cloture des offres (French)**: November 14, 2022, at 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Date (English) / Date de modification (French)**: November 8, 2022

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

* **Procurement Category (English) / Catégorie d'approvisionnement (French)**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method (English) / Méthode d'approvisionnement (French)**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements (English) / Accords commerciaux (French)**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contract Information**
------------------------

* **Contracting Entity (English) / Entreprise contractante (French)**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User (English) / Utilisateur final (French)**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Regions of Delivery (English) / Régions de livraison (French)**: Shawinigan, Québec, Canada

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**
-----------------------------

* The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a set of music instruments.
* The proposed delivery location is Shawinigan, Québec, Canada.
* The RFP is detailed in Section 7 of the solicitation documents.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* For more information, please contact:
  * Name: Martineau, Francois S
  * Email: francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
  * URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14385230?extsite=MTQzODUyMzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
